document.docAuthor: Barbosa, Julianna Freires & Nessimian, Jorge Luiz
document.masterDocTitle: The genus Buenoa Kirkaldy, 1904 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Notonectidae) in northern Brazil: inventory, new records, and new species

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Buenoa Kirkaldy, 1904 (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Nepomorpha: Notonectidae) in northern Brazil: inventory, new records, and new species

figureCitation.captionText: FIGURES 63 – 71. 63 – 65. Buenoa amnigenopsis Nieser. 63, Lateral view of male rostrum with rostral prong longer than third rostral segment; 64, Ventral view of male fore leg with femur notched, without stridulatory area, and similar teeth on tibia; 65, Claspers. Scale bar: 0.5 mm. 66 – 68. Buenoa amnigenus (White). 66, Lateral view of male rostrum with rostral prong longer than third rostral segment; 67, Ventral view of male fore leg without stridulatory area on femur and similar teeth on tibia; 68, Claspers. 69 – 71. Buenoa salutis Kirkaldy. 69, Lateral view of male rostrum with rostral prong equal to or slightly longer than third rostral segment; 70, Ventral view of male fore leg without stridulatory area on femur and slightly dissimilar teeth on tibia; 71, Claspers. Scale bar: 0.5 mm.

subSubSection.paragraph:
Anisops amnigenus White, 1879 : 271
[ Type locality: Manaos, Brazil ; Type in British Museum ( England )].

Buenoa amnigenus : Kirkaldy ( 1904 )
: 120 [New combination; Note: Brazil ]; Kirkaldy and Torre-Bueno ( 1909 ): 200 [Note: Brazil ]; Truxal ( 1953 ): 1462 [Revision; Distribution and records: Guyana , Brazil , Peru , Bolivia , Paraguay ]; Truxal ( 1957 ): 17 [Systematics; expedition in Goiás and Tocantins, Brazil ]; Bachmann ( 1971 ): 602 [Records: Paraguay , Argentina ]; Nieser and Alkins-Koo ( 1991 ): 33 [Survey: Trinidad and Tobago ]; Nieser ( 1975 ): 181 [Records: Suriname , Brazil , Peru , Bolivia ]; Backmann ( 1998 ): 179 [ Argentina ]; Heckman ( 1998 a): 254 [Survey: Pantanal ( Brazil )]; Heckman ( 1998 b): 39 [Survey: Pantanal ( Brazil )]; Estévez et al. ( 2003 ): 371 [Survey: Esteros del Iberá ( Argentina )]; López Ruf et al . ( 2003 ): 68 [Survey: Parque Nacional Mburucuyá ( Argentina )]; Heckman ( 2011 ): 483 [Key to
Buenoa
of South America ]; Moreira et al . ( 2011 ): 53 [Check-list of Brazil ].

Comments.
Buenoa amnigenus
resembles
B. salutis
,
B. amnigenopsis ,
and
B. amnigenoidea
(for comparisons see the cited species).
